hint.html: Gross weight over 3,500kg but less than 12,000kg.
Gross weight over 750kg but less than 3,500kg.
Gross weight over 3,500kg but less than 10,000kg.
Vehicle designed and constructed for the carriage of passengers and comprising no more than eight seats in addition to the driver's seat.

Engine capacity less than 50cm³ and, whatever the means of propulsion, a maximum design speed less than 50km/h.

For example an electric bicycle.

A three-wheeled vehicle, with an engine capacity less than 50cm³ and, whatever the means of propulsion, a maximum design speed less than 50km/h.

For example an auto rickshaw.

A two-wheeled vehicle with an engine capacity more than 50cm³ or, whatever the means of propulsion, a maximum design speed over 50km/h.

For example a motorcycle.

A vehicle with three wheels asymmetrically arranged in relation to the longitudinal median plane with an engine capacity more than 50cm³ or, whatever the means of propulsion, a maximum design speed over 50 km/h.

For example a motorcycle with a sidecar.

A vehicle with three wheels symmetrically arranged in relation to the longitudinal median plane with an engine capacity more than 50cm³ or, whatever the means of propulsion a maximum design speed over 50km/h.

For example a motorised tricycle.

A vehicle with four wheels whose unladen mass is less than 350kg, not including the mass of the batteries in case of electric vehicles, whose maximum design speed is less than 45km/h, and whose engine capacity less than 50cm³ for spark (positive) ignition engines, or whose maximum net power output does not exceed 4kW in the case of other internal combustion engines, or whose maximum continuous rated power does not exceed 4kW in the case of electric engines.

For example golf carts and mobility scooters.

A vehicle with four wheels, other than that classified for the category L6, whose unladen mass is less than 400 kg (550 kg for vehicles intended for carrying goods), not including the mass of batteries in the case of electric vehicles and whose maximum continuous rated power does not exceed 15 kW.

For example microcars.
